languages.text: "Обязательно учтите это, если вам понадобится спутник на какой-то раут. Знаете, не пьющий, бдительный и умеющий прикрывать спину".
"You should take that into account if you ever need an escort for some high society event. You know, one who actually has your back and keeps watch instead of drinking."
languages.original_text: "Обязательно учтите это, если вам понадобится спутник на какой-то раут. Знаете, не пьющий, бдительный и умеющий прикрывать спину".

traits.locale_text: "You should take it into account if you ever need an escort for some high society event. You know, one who actually has your back and keeps watch instead of drinking."

"You should take that into account if you ever need an escort for some high society event. You know, one who actually has your back and keeps watch instead of drinking."

languages.text: 「今後、もし上流階級の催しに護衛をつける必要があるなら、その点を考慮したほうがいいですよ。つまり、飲んだくれる代わりに、きちんとあなたを守り、周囲に目を光らせてくれるような護衛を選ぶことです」
languages.original_text: "You should take that into account if you ever need an escort for some high society event. You know, one who actually has your back and keeps watch instead of drinking."

traits.locale_text: 「今後、もし上流階級の催しに護衛をつける必要があるなら、その点を考慮したほうがいいですよ。つまり、飲んだくれる代わりに、きちんとあなたを守り、周囲に目を光らせてくれるような護衛を選ぶことです」

languages.text: "Das solltet Ihr berücksichtigen, falls Ihr jemals eine Begleitung für ein hochrangiges Ereignis benötigt. Also, eine, die tatsächlich auf Euch aufpasst und Wache hält, anstatt zu trinken."
languages.original_text: "You should take that into account if you ever need an escort for some high society event. You know, one who actually has your back and keeps watch instead of drinking."

traits.locale_text: "Das solltet Ihr berücksichtigen, falls Ihr jemals eine Begleitung für ein hochrangiges Ereignis benötigt. Also, eine, die tatsächlich auf Euch aufpasst und Wache hält, anstatt zu trinken."

languages.text: « Prenez cet élément en considération la prochaine fois que vous aurez besoin d'une escorte lors d'un événement mondain. Vous savez, il est bon de pouvoir compter sur une personne fiable, vigilante, mais surtout sobre. »
languages.original_text: "You should take that into account if you ever need an escort for some high society event. You know, one who actually has your back and keeps watch instead of drinking."

traits.locale_text: « Prenez cet élément en considération la prochaine fois que vous aurez besoin d'une escorte lors d'un événement mondain. Vous savez, il est bon de pouvoir compter sur une personne fiable, vigilante, mais surtout sobre. »

languages.text: «Debería tenerlo en cuenta si alguna vez necesita acompañante para algún evento de la alta sociedad. Ya sabe, alguien que de verdad le guarde las espaldas y monte guardia en vez de empinar el codo».
languages.original_text: "You should take that into account if you ever need an escort for some high society event. You know, one who actually has your back and keeps watch instead of drinking."

traits.locale_text: «Debería tenerlo en cuenta si alguna vez necesita acompañante para algún evento de la alta sociedad. Ya sabe, alguien que de verdad le guarde las espaldas y monte guardia en vez de empinar el codo».

languages.text: “如果你参加上流社会的活动时需要保镖，你就应该能理解这一点。我的意思是说，你需要的是个真正能守着你、保护你安全的人，不是跑去喝酒撒欢的人。”
languages.original_text: "You should take that into account if you ever need an escort for some high society event. You know, one who actually has your back and keeps watch instead of drinking."

traits.locale_text: “如果你参加上流社会的活动时需要保镖，你就应该能理解这一点。我的意思是说，你需要的是个真正能守着你、保护你安全的人，不是跑去喝酒撒欢的人。”

languages.text: "Bir gün yüksek sosyete etkinliğine giderken yanınıza birini almak isterseniz bu dediğinizi unutmayın. Gerçekten arkanızı kollayan ve içip azıtmak yerine daima tetikte olan birini."
languages.original_text: "You should take that into account if you ever need an escort for some high society event. You know, one who actually has your back and keeps watch instead of drinking."

traits.locale_text: "Bir gün bir yüksek sosyete etkinliğine giderken yanınıza birini almak isterseniz bu dediğinizi unutmayın. Gerçekten arkanızı kollayan ve içip azıtmak yerine daima tetikte olan birini."

languages.original_text: "You should take that into account if you ever need an escort for some high society event. You know, one who actually has your back and keeps watch instead of drinking."
